value.title: Another Power BI optimization tool - Report Analyzer
value.excerpt: Already optimized your data model and still having some performance issues in Power BI? Check out Michael Kovalsky's Report Analyzer tool to inspect your report.   Michael Kovalsky: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelkovalsky/  Michael Kovalsky's blog: https://www.elegantbi.com/  Report Analyzer https://www.elegantbi.com/post/reportanalyzer

value.title: Answering your datamart questions
value.excerpt: You've got a LOT of questions about datamarts in Power BI! Adam answers a few that we've seen popping up. Giving his thoughts on these questions.  Introduction to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview  Comparing dataflows to datamarts https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/datamarts/datamarts-overview#comparing-dataflows-to-datamarts

value.title: API's, Prototyping, Size increase - Roundup #45
value.excerpt: Steve Howards looks at working with OData and OAuth with Power BI. Bill Anton looks at prototyping and comparing Power BI Desktop to Power Pivot/Excel. We also had a few updates from the Power BI team regarding Q&A working with direct connections via the enterprise gateway, Query Parameters and Templating

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript

value.title: Are you following best practices with Azure Synapse Analytics?
value.excerpt: How do you know if you are following best practices for Azure Synapse Analytics? One way is to check out this report that Patrick walks through. It's a great way to get an understanding where your database is at!  Azure Synapse Analyzer Report to monitor and improve Azure Synapse SQL Dedicated Pool performance

value.title: Are you mobile?
value.excerpt: I take a look at the different mobile apps for Power BI. From the iOS apps (for iPhone and iPad), to Android and the new Windows 10 Universal App.  You can also connect to an on-premises Reporting Services server to look at mobile reports.  Spud Trooper and Darth Potato are there to help!  SUBSCRIBE!

value.title: Are you using your licenses correct? See where Azure Hybrid Benefits can help!
value.excerpt: If you are moving your on-premises SQL Servers to the cloud, and/or if you have a mix of Azure SQL, Managed Instance and on-prem, make sure you are licensing correctly with Azure Hybrid Benefits. Shashank shows us how!  Azure Hybrid Benefit https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/hybrid-benefit/  Azure Hybrid

value.title: Attending SQLBits for the first time
value.excerpt: I had the opportunity to attend SQLBits for the first time in the UK. This was an outstanding event with great people and an awesome attendee party. This clip are some highlights from the event to hopefully convey what it was like to attend. This event really showed how great the SQL Family is!!!  Music

value.title: Automating Power BI License Assignment with PowerShell - Extra Options!
value.excerpt: I posted a video on the Power BI YouTube channel for using PowerShel and the Audit log to assign Power BI Pro licenses. In this video, I give you a few other options instead of automating off of the audit log.  Main video: Using Power BI Audit Log and PowerShell to assign Power BI Pro licenses - https://youtu.be/oulR910VBrU

value.title: Automating your formatted tables in Power BI!
value.excerpt: Wondering how you can take advantage of the Formatted Tables feature in Power BI and automate the output to email? Jason Himmelstein shows you how you can do this with Power Automate!  Connect with Jason: https://twitter.com/jasehimm https://www.linkedin.com/in/jasonhimmelstein/ https://bifocal.show/

value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  ðŸ“¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want

value.excerpt: Ever run into a Parameter error when trying to refresh a partition in Power BI? It can drive you BANANAS! value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Build Your Personal Brand: 3 things with Steve Jones
value.excerpt: Are you curious how you can build your personal brand? In this video, we talk with Steve Jones, from SQL Server Central and Redgate, about 3 things you can start working on today to build your personal brand.  Connect with Steve Jones!  Twitter: https://twitter.com/way0utwest SQL Server Central: http://www.sqlservercentral.com/

value.title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
value.excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.  With looking at the upcoming Power BI GA, this may be handy for assigning multiple Free licenses to your users, or Pro licenses.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Can I use the audit log if I'm a Power BI Admin?
value.excerpt: In this video, I answer a question I get fairly often. Can I use the audit log if I have the Power BI service administrator role assigned to me within Office 365.   I also make an announcement about the future of Guy in a Cube.  Admin portal doc - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/powerbi-admin-portal/
